## Return Value

A sample buffer object.

## Discussion

If you created the generator with a `nil` timebase, any associated [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVSampleBufferRequest] objects default to using a request mode of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVSampleBufferRequest/Mode-swift.enum/immediate].

Call the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVSampleBufferGenerator/notifyOfDataReady(for:completionHandler:)] class method to have the system notify you when sample buffer data is available.

The request may fail based on generator configuration or file format.

# makeSampleBuffer(for:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a sample buffer, and attempts to load its data asynchronously if requested.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeSampleBuffer(for request: AVSampleBufferRequest) throws -> sending CMSampleBuffer
```

## Parameters

- **request**: A sample buffer creation request.

## Return Value

A sample buffer object.

## Discussion

If you created the generator with a `nil` timebase, any associated [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVSampleBufferRequest] objects default to using a request mode of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVSampleBufferRequest/Mode-swift.enum/immediate].

Call the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVSampleBufferGenerator/notifyOfDataReady(for:completionHandler:)] class method to have the system notify you when sample buffer data is available.

The request may fail based on generator configuration or file format.

## Creating a sample buffer

- **makeBatch()**: Creates a batch object to handle generating multiple sample buffers.
- **makeSampleBuffer(for:addTo:)**: Creates a sample buffer and attempts to defer I/O for its data.
- **createSampleBuffer(for:)**: Creates a new sample buffer reference for the specified buffer request.
